description: portrait of a man with short, curly dark hair and a dark beard and moustache; door behind man in ULQ
inscription:
Title and Inscription

LLC below image, printed in black: [Bracquemond, del, et sc.]; LRC below image, printed in black: [A. Cadart, Edit. Imp, 56, Bard Haussmann, Paris.]; URC of image, printed in black: [6.]; on back, in pencil: [3]
provenance: [Pia Gallo, New York, until 2010; sold in August for AOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2010-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Portrait of Alphonse Legros
